Doing

Done

  • Deprecate root_url and change to base_url (check out hostname) in comments @trinker
  • Add spaces code examples in vignette
  • Rework metadata arguments (return values and examples)
  • Statement of need
  • Added spaces code examples in README
  • Long error/warning messages (added newlines)
  • Numbering steps when creating a config file
  • Add vertical spacing for readability where possible
  • getSurvey() has a mix of snake case and camel case in arguments. Deprecated both in favour of saveDir and forceRequest
  • The base url in Qualtrics documentation ends with /API. check this out and explain in README why user does not have to pass this. Qualtrics has changed this several times (base url used to be root url. URL still points to root url).
  • Minimal readSurvey example added for both current and legacy data exports.
  • Checked all examples for deprecated arguments.
  • Hadley’s coding style check in examples

Comment

  • Like the ideo of a video. Will keep this in mind for next update. Plan to re-write this s.t. order is (.RProfile –> .qualtRics.yml –> passed by user to function).
  • ?? Function titles are lower cased in .Rd files (and roxygen). CRAN Ext. states “Title information for the Rd file. This should be capitalized and not end in a period…”
  • Snake case is not used because package already on CRAN. Aim to use rOpenSci’s guidelines for deprecation of these functions and replace them with e.g. ‘qualtrics_get_survey()’ etc. Should be done by version 4.0.
  • httptest package is suggested so that could be the reason that some tests fail. Would it be good to move this to ‘imports’ field?
